page.title: 02AUCHENDOWNIE FARM
page.content: It is situated about 2 miles north of Upper Largo covering 213 acres.The land is undulating in this area and there is also a lot of drainage due to the clay soil.The A916 is the only major road running through this area,the others are minor roads.Largo Law is the highest piece of land in this area,rising from 137m to 290m.Auchendownie is a highly mechanised arable farm,the crops grown are main crop potatoes and the others are winter wheat and spring barley.The wheat covers 70 acresof farmland,the barley,118 acresand the potatoes,25 acres.the barley is sold to maltsters in Kirkcaldy for whisky making,the potatoes are sold to local merchants and the wheat is either used for fodder or milling for flour.
